Explore Jobs

The plots below can be used to explore the dataset of jobs and salaries that was used to create the models at the core of this project. Have fun!


GitHub

This application was created in partial fulfillment of the requirements of the UC-Berkeley Masters of Information in Data Science (MIDS) program in 2018.
